channel.title: Need help with Special

item.title: Need help with Special
item.dc:creator: @JosephPk JosephPk
item.description:
@JosephPk wrote:

Hey, when i add the special code, the ints, and the special bar frames and crap it compiles successfully. When i log on to my server and wield the weapon the special bar doesn’t show up… Anyone help? Heres my special code…

public void specials2() { // Dragon Scimmy spec if(!inSafezone()) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587) { if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) if (specialAmount >= 0) { setAnimation(347); hitDiff = 40; inCombat(); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; specialRestoreTimer = 50; specialsBar(); specglow = false; specBar -= 50; } else { sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that."); } } } }

And heres the original spec i used to create that one.

public void specials() { // Whip spec if(!inSafezone()) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) if (specBar >= 50) { setAnimation(1658); hitDiff = 40; inCombat(); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; specialRestoreTimer = 50; specBar -= 50; specglow = false; } else { sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that."); } } } }

And heres the void i added for the d scimmy spec

public void specialsBar() { if (specialAmount >= 0 && specialAmount <= 24) { sendFrame126("S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 12335); frame230(0, 12325, 0, 0); frame230(0, 12326, 0, 0); frame230(0, 12327, 0, 0); frame230(0, 12328, 0, 0); frame230(0, 12329, 0, 0); frame230(0, 12330, 0, 0); frame230(0, 12331, 0, 0); frame230(0, 12332, 0, 0); frame230(0, 12333, 0, 0); frame230(0, 12334, 0, 0); } }

Heres the void for the whip spec.

[code]public void SpecialsProcess() {
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) {
specbar(12323);
}

if (specBar >= 100)
{
frame230(0, 12325, 0, 0);//beginning
frame230(0, 12326, 0, 0);//2nd part
frame230(0, 12327, 0, 0);//3rd part
frame230(0, 12328, 0, 0);//4th part
frame230(0, 12329, 0, 0);//middle
frame230(0, 12330, 0, 0);//4 from end
frame230(0, 12331, 0, 0);//3 from end
frame230(0, 12332, 0, 0);//2 from end
frame230(0, 12333, 0, 0);//1 from end
frame230(0, 12334, 0, 0);//end
}
if (specBar == 50)
{
frame230(0, 12328, 0, 0);//4th part
frame230(0, 12329, 0, 0);//middle
frame230(0, 12330, 0, 0);//4 from end
}
if (specBar == 0)
{
specbar(12325);
}

}[/code]

Also i have tryed to add the d scimmy id beside the whip like,

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 || if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587) {

but the special bar didn’t show up…
and if i have to do all sorts of stuff to add the special bar i would be happy for someone to help me put it on the emotes…

Thanks-

Anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2008, 06:21:55 PM[/size][hr]

Read full topic
